Facts

Debt FREE Tenants-in-Common (TIC) Investments

Important Investment Facts:

  • New Construction of Institutional Quality Investment Property
  • Long-term Net Lease Guaranteed by Blue Chip National Companies
    1. History of monthly lease payments on TIC Debt FREE properties
  • Low Risk real estate Investment
    1. NO mortgage – NO foreclosure risk
    2. NO Cash Calls on any Debt FREE TIC Sponsored property
  • TIC Owner has Title to their Fractional Interest
    1. Undiluted benefit with ALL the advantages and rights of real estate ownership
  • Qualified investment for 1031 Exchange, IRA and 401k
    1. Currently - Higher yield alternative to CD’s and Money Market

Advantages of the TIC investment Option:

  • Available to all types of Investors with Low Minimum Investment
  • Third-party Professional Management, eliminating day-to-day Landlord headaches
  • Certainty of Closing for a 1031 Exchange
    1. Sponsor Buys Property and then sells Fractional TIC Interests “Buy by the Whole and Sell by the Slice”
  • Diversification by Location, Industry and Tenant

Example - $100,000 purchase of Debt FREE TIC Investment

1. Initial Cash Return

$7,000

- 7% initial lease Cash-on-Cash Return

2. Tax Shelter

$800

- 39 Year SL Depreciation 80/20 allocation

3. Appreciation

$2,500

- 2.5% annual Appreciation over time

ROI

$10,320

Effective Annual Return – 10.32%
